goal: Enforce full file paths in all Claude Code operations - file operations must use absolute paths

fields.who: Claude Code file operation tools (Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep)
fields.what: All file paths in Claude Code operations MUST be absolute (full) paths, not relative
fields.when: Every file operation (Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep)
fields.why: Relative paths cause ambiguity when cwd changes and make audit logs inconsistent
fields.how: PreToolUse hook validates file_path parameters start with / (Unix) or drive letter (Windows)
fields.which: Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep tools; file_path parameter
fields.lest: Must not allow relative paths; must not break legitimate absolute path operations
fields.measuredBy: Hook blocks relative paths; tests pass; CLAUDE.md updated
